Achievements / Awards

Show All   Hide All

Shishuvan is proud to announce our presence on the Education World School Ranking 2014 list. Shishuvan has moved up in it's city, state and nationwide ranking when compared to last year.

Shishuvan is ranked:

Mumbai 5th - last year 10th
Maharashtra 5th - last year 11th
All India - 19th - Last year 30th

    PARAMETERS FOR SELECTION
  • Teacher welfare & development
  • Competence of faculty
  • Academic reputation
  • Co-curricular Education
  • Sports Education
  • Life skills education & conflict management
  • Individual attention to students
  • Leadership management quality
  • Parental involvement
  • Infrastructure provision
  • Internationalism
  • Special needs education
  • Value of Money
  • Community service
The research and survey were conducted by C fore, New Delhi.




Shishuvan comes out top on ranking of schools in Mumbai East Zone by Hindustan Times

Shishuvan is the No 1 school in Mumbai East Zone.

The Hindustan Times recently concluded a survey on the top schools in the city and Shishuvan was ranked no 1 in Mumbai East. Schools were judged on a number of criteria including pedagogy, quality of teaching and extra curricular activities.

British Council International School Award (ISA)

We are proud to announce that Shishuvan School has been seleted by BRITISH COUNCIL LIBRARY for the BRITISH COUNCIL INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL AWARD (ISA). This award was presented to the school on 27th Aug 2007 in the Award program in Kolkatta.




Sahir D'souza is "Campfire's Young Writer of the Year 2012"

Sahir D'souza, Std VIII, is Campfire's Young Writer of the Year 2012.



His prize-winning story is titled "The Spirit and the Tree". For more information visit campfire.co.in
